answers.answer: Hey there, the chances are about 1 in 10 of it re occuring, check out this web page, it has all the information you will need. I am so sorry to hear about the loss of your baby girl :( I wish you luck in any future pregnancies. xxhttp://arabiaenglish.babycenter.com/pregnancy/havinganother/preeclampsia/

question: I had severe pre eclampsia at 23 weeks in my last pregnancy and lost my daughter.I'm pregnant again 5 months later. Will this pregnancy be the same.
title: Chance of other pregnancies having it
